verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H4853"\w* \w about|strong="H4853"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w which|strong="H4853"\w* came \w to|strong="H5612"\w* \w Nahum|strong="H5151"\w* from Elkosh. God’s wrath

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* tolerates no rivals. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* vengeful \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fierce \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w does|strong="H3068"\w* not fail \w to|strong="H3068"\w* punish \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w foes|strong="H6862"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* vengeful \w against|strong="H2534"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* slow \w to|strong="H3068"\w* anger, \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* guilty \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* escape \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5352"\w*. \w Storm|strong="H5492"\w* \w tempest|strong="H5492"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w path|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w rebukes|strong="H1605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w dries|strong="H3001"\w* \w it|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w makes|strong="H3001"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w streams|strong="H5104"\w* \w run|strong="H3001"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*. \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* \w are|strong="H5104"\w* languishing \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bloom \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7493"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w dissolve|strong="H4127"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* earth heaves \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w withstand|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heat|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w*? \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* pours \w forth|strong="H5413"\w* \w like|strong="H2534"\w* fire, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* shatters \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

\w With|strong="H6213"\w* rushing \w flood|strong="H7858"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w makes|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w those|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H6213"\w* rise \w against|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* drives \w his|strong="H6213"\w* enemies \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w plot|strong="H2803"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w end|strong="H3617"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* only takes vengeance \w once|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w Thorns|strong="H5518"\w*, \w tangled|strong="H5440"\w* \w and|strong="H5704"\w* \w drenched|strong="H4390"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4390"\w* consumed \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*.

Nineveh! \w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* arisen \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* plots \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*. Good news for Judah

\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘Though \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* strong, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H5674"\w*. Though \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*,

\w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H4132"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* necks \w and|strong="H7665"\w* snap \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w chains|strong="H4147"\w*.’

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, Nineveh: ‘\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* remembered. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w every|strong="H7760"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w image|strong="H6459"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tomb|strong="H6913"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w*.’

Look! On the mountains \w a|strong="H3068"\w* messenger bringing good news, announcing peace! ‘Celebrate the feasts, Judah, fulfil your vows. Never again will these enemies invade your land, they are destroyed!’
